name: kagent-vision
description: AI-powered vision agent: webcam capture, Nano Banana image transformation, Veo3 video generation, and ASL interpretation

skills.name: Camera Control
skills.description: Detect, open, configure, and capture from webcams or connected cameras (iPhone, USB)

skills.name: Image Detection
skills.description: Scan directories for existing image files to use as input

skills.name: Nano Banana
skills.description: AI image generation and transformation using Gemini Image Generation API

skills.name: Veo3 Video
skills.description: Generate 8-second AI video clips from text prompts or images using Veo 3

skills.name: ASL Interpreter
skills.description: American Sign Language understanding, transcription, and ASL gloss response generation
